CatDescriptText: Mr. Andrew Smith, 2154 Fifth Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think those receiving Mother's Assistance should be required to report to the proper authorities just how all of the grant is spent, or should the present latitude in spending it be permitted to continue?" answer reads: "They should be required to give an account as to how they spend the money. Then you will know that it is going for a good cause."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Andrew Smith wearing dark hat, standing in front of Jenkins Arcade, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
